title: 游戏崩溃！
author: LoganSKY
txt_content:
一天能崩溃好多次，服务器不崩，客户端崩


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Uh... Did I do that?

Time: 18-2-1 下午6:38
Description: Updating screen events

replies.author: sjx
replies.txt_content:
Ex Nihilo (Ex-Nihilo-1.38-52.jar)
Hunger Overhaul (HungerOverhaul-1.7.10-beta.1.jar)
以上两个Mod冲突
建议把Mod更新到最新版，如果不行可以备份后删除其中一个Mod

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 你显卡或者显卡驱动有问题。。。升级显卡驱动试试？

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 如果升级显卡驱动不行就把OptiFine删了试试。
